title: Carrot Weather update brings custom tab bar, locations list forecasts, new secret locations, more
content:
Carrot Weather has become even better today with a new update bringing features like tab bar customization, locations list forecasts, and new layout sections. There are also fresh secret locations, new layout sections, and more.
